meanings.definition: Having a finial or decorative ornament at the end.
meanings.sent1: The curtain rod was finialed with a beautiful golden end piece.
meanings.sent2: The staircase railing was finialed with an elegant finial.
meanings.sent3: The lamp post looked like it was finialed by a fancy crown.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was finialed with a stunning brooch at the collar.
meanings.sent5: The gate was finialed with a majestic eagle sculpture at the top.

meanings.definition: Finished or completed with a decorative end piece.
meanings.sent1: The project was finialed with a shiny bow on top.
meanings.sent2: The gift box was finialed with a festive ribbon.
meanings.sent3: The cake was finialed with a tiny flag that said 'Congratulations'.
meanings.sent4: The building was finialed with a grand flagpole at the roof.
meanings.sent5: The garden was finialed with a colorful wind chime at the entrance.

meanings.definition: Adorned with a finial at the top or end.
meanings.sent1: The bedpost was finialed with a delicate wooden knob.
meanings.sent2: The fence was finialed with a charming birdhouse at the corner.
meanings.sent3: The gate was finialed with a whimsical unicorn figure.
meanings.sent4: The flagpole was finialed with a patriotic flag waving in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The staircase was finialed with a carved dragon head at the banister.
